instructions.title: Instructions
items: W: aim AOE (then Left Click to cast, ESC cancels)
B: Recall to village (opens portal back)

start.title: Journey of the Thunder God
start.story: The world has slipped into shadow. Waking phantoms roam the land; only one god can summon the storm again. Lead Zeus — the thunder god — through wild forests, ruined villages and battlefields, slaying hordes of creatures and restoring order.
